Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product is not just an item but a testament to our dedication to quality and innovation. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product for $15000. I trust this investment will prove to be highly rewarding for you. Should you have any questions or require more information, please feel free to ask. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
